title: Gatherings during marriages, funerals restricted in Himachal Pradesh
description: With the recent spike in Covid-19 cases, the Himachal Pradesh government has decided to restrict gatherings at marriage ceremonies to 50 people indoors and with a maximum of 200 for outdoors, an official spokesperson said. The decision was taken during a meeting chaired by Chief Minister Jai Ram Thakur to review the Covid-19 situation here on Tuesday. Besides, only 50 persons will be allowed to attend the funeral.
